doc.description: Mediatek MT3329 GPS (UART) Driver for Mediatek MT3329 GPS, DIYDrones V1.4/1.6 protocol

configure.name: MTK_GPS_PORT
configure.description: UART where the GPS is connected to (UART1, UART2, etc

configure.name: GPS_LED
configure.description: LED number to indicate fix or none

makefile.raw: ifdef SECONDARY_GPS ifneq (,$(findstring $(SECONDARY_GPS), mtk mediatek)) # this is the secondary GPS ap.CFLAGS += -DGPS_SECONDARY_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/gps/gps_mtk.h\" ap.CFLAGS += -DSECONDARY_GPS=GPS_MTK else ap.CFLAGS += -DGPS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/gps/gps_mtk.h\" ap.CFLAGS += -DPRIMARY_GPS=GPS_MTK endif else # plain old single GPS usage ap.CFLAGS += -DGPS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/gps/gps_mtk.h\" endif
